title: Bug 114470: Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter.
description: When using the expression new Date("3/2/2005") as a value in a table filter, an error is thrown.
OB: There are errors on the report page when the filter is applied. The error message states: 'There are error(s) in Table: table8. Error0: data.engine.DataConversionError (1 time(s)). Detail: An error happened in data type conversion. Cannot convert it to Date. Cannot convert it to Date.'
EB: Save and preview the report. The filter should work without any errors.
SR:
1. Open the report.
2. Navigate to the table filter settings.
3. Set the filter value as new Date("3/2/2005").
4. Apply the filter.
5. Save and preview the report.
6. Verify that the filter works without throwing any errors.
